page.title: 03LEIGH PARK GARDENS
page.content: The gardens and the buildings of the home farm attached to the old Leigh Park House are owned by Portsmouth Corporation and are open to the public. To the north of Middle Park Way lie the ornamental gardens which include the arboretum. An open area marks the site of the old house, from the terrace the lawn drops down toward the lake. to the north and west lie the City nurseries. South of the road the remainder of the gardens and the farm buildings house the farm trail where rare breeds and domestic animals may be seen by the public between April and October. The gardens are due to be included as part of an 1100 acre informal country park and a project officer has recently been appointed.
